title: Want to own the s6 ward!
body:
my ign: SmOochie
main mid and top, Yasuo prefer! currently is s5, maybe the end of this season, i will be the same as s5 LoL
im finding a team, good team, no feed, no trash, no feeder, no... etc, which team have a free slot as mid or top, add me in pls/ thks alots :D dont just add me, pls add to the team straight away :D

replies.body:
> no trash

I'm trash and found that offensive.

(also, you're s5 so...)
